title: Drawing, "South Dome from the Nevada Trail, Yosemite", 1891
medium:
Recto: Brush and gray, black and white wash, graphite on gray paper.
Verso: Brush and gray, black, white and rose wash, graphite on gray paper.
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite ?, upper left: Bck of the South Dome/ from the Nevada Trail.
Verso: Inscribed in white, ?: South Dome from the Nevada Trail; added in graphite: falls; and again, at upper left: Back of S. Dome.
description:
Verso: Horizontal view of three peaks in the middle ground with snow-covered Dome in the left background. A horseman is seen upon a trail through a rugged promontory foreground.

Recto: Vertical view of the snow-covered peak in the left background; a rocky summit is in the right foreground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "South Dome from the Nevada Trail, Yosemite", 1891.
1891. Recto: Brush and gray, black and white wash, graphite on gray paper.
Verso: Brush and gray, black, white and rose wash, graphite on gray paper.. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-75.
